org.diachron.detection.utils

Class JSONMessagesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diachron.detection.utils.JSONMessagesParser

  • public class JSONMessagesParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a set of static methods which are used for the definition of a complex change using a JSON string as input. This json string must have the following form:

    {
    "Complex_Change": "Mark_as_Obsolete_v2",
    "Priority": 1,
    "Complex_Change_Parameters": [
    {
    "obs_class": "sc1:-subclass"
    }
    ],
    "Simple_Changes": [
    {
    "Simple_Change": "ADD_SUPERCLASS",
    "Simple_Change_Uri": "sc1",
    "Is_Optional": false,
    "Selection_Filter": "sc1:-superclass = ",
    "Mapping_Filter": "",
    "Join_Filter": ""
    }
    ], "Version_Filters" : [ {
    "Subject" : "sc1:ADD_SUPERCLASS:-subject",
    "Predicate" : "rdfs:subClassOf",
    "Object" : "rdfs:Resource",
    "Presence" : "EXISTS_IN_V2"
    }
    ]
    }

    • Method Detail

      • createCCDefinition

        public static CCManager createCCDefinition(java.util.Properties prop,
                           java.lang.String json,
                           java.lang.String changesOntologySchema)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This static method stores the definition of a complex change into the changes ontology schema. The complex change definition is encoded into a json representation.
        Parameters:
        prop - A properties file which contains the Virtuoso credentials.
        json - The json representation of the complex change.
        changesOntologySchema - The changes ontology schema into which the complex change will be stored.
        Returns:
        An instance of CCManager which is the class for the Complex Change representation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.Exception
